entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 10:15 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
